title: Customer_Analyzer v1: Backfill + scheduled refresh for segment IDs and fit tiers on existing accounts

sections.text: Add a backfill job to populate Customer_Analyzer segment IDs and fit tiers for all existing Issue_Tracker accounts referenced by past ingested conversations, handling missing/unknown values safely. Implement a scheduled refresh mechanism (e.g., daily with per-account TTL using last_fetched_at) to keep these fields reasonably up to date without hammering Customer_Analyzer. Ensure the job is idempotent and produces basic metrics/logging for success/failure rates.
